ngiemboon: Á té poŋo lézyɛʼɛ lǎŋ mekʉ̀ʼʉ mekʉ̀ʼʉ wɔ́.
en: It is not good to cross the road diagonally.

ngiemboon: Aguɔ nweʼé gú tà ɔ̀ ge gʉa mbʉ̀a mé záʼ melaŋ mú.
en: The illness has threatened you so much that you will go to the village for a rite.

ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn tʉʉ twó mélàʼ shǔ we wɛ̂.
en: This child is stubborn because of his friend.

ngiemboon: Mélàʼa kɔ́ ɔ̀ těen ḿpfɛ́ɛ mmó wɔ́?
